altername_name: Nyuushi Chokuzen Check: Nanmon Kimon Kiki Kaikai
Nyūshi Chokuzen Check: Nanmon Kimon Kiki Kaikai
name: Nyuushi Chokuzen Check: Nanmon Kimon Kiki Kaikai
overview: Nyuushi Chokuzen Check: Nanmon Kimon Kiki Kaikai (入試直前チェック難問奇問危機解決) is a video game released for the Sega Mega Drive exclusively through the Sega Channel service in Japan. It was never released physically, however, a copy of the ROM was discovered and released in 2017.
